features.in its twentieth flight (PSLV: C18) launches Megha-Tropiques satellite along with three auxiliary payloads with a total payload mass of 1047 kg from the first launch pad of Satish Dhawan Space Centre (SDSC SHAR). PSLV-C18 is the seventh flight of PSLV in 'core-alone' configuration i.e, without solid strap-on motors.
